34.ara-name: كتاب الرؤيا عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah said:"The Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) was asked about Waraqah. Khadijah said to him: 'He believed in you, but he died before your advent.' So the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said: 'I saw him in a dream, and upon him were white garments. If he were among the inhabitants of the Fire then he would have been wearing other than that

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي رُؤْيَا النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم الْمِيزَانَ وَالدَّلْوَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Prophet(ﷺ) Dreaming About The Scale And The Bucket
